channel.title: Mysql on Jonathan Piedra
channel.description: Recent content in Mysql on Jonathan Piedra

item.title: Node.js Connector to a MySQL Database
item.description: A simple module that connects to MySQL databases. No need to hardcode your credentials.

item.title: Connecting to MySQL on a VirtualBox Linux VM
item.description: Here are a few considerations to keep in mind if you’re running a VirtualBox VM with MySQL on it, and need an application on your host operating system to be able to connect to it.

item.title: Web API, written using PHP and MySQL - Part 1
item.description: In this first part of a series on implementing a PHP/MySQL-based API endpoint for our data, we go over some basic principles, as well as stated goals, that will guide the work we’ll be undertaking later.
